maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/1/sett.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/1/sett.text: La porte est verrouillée, c'est ça ? On dirait que l'on est piégé ici.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: She responds!
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Elle réagit !

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Good morning.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bonjour.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: She...\. looks scared?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Elle...\. à l'air effrayée ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Well...\. it might be due to your appearance.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est...\. peut-être à cause de ton apparence.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: I suppose...\. One moment, then.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bon peut-être...\. Un moment, s'il te plait.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: This should be more casual.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Cette tenue devrait être plus décontractée.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Can't you...\. speak?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu ne peux...\. pas parler ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Hm...\. that's something we need to look into.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Hum...\. C'est quelque chose qu'il faudra regarder.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: But you still seem to understand us, don't you?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais tu sembles nous comprendre, c'est ça ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [nods]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Interesting.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Intéressant.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: A mute woman that can still listen...\. how nostalgic.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Une femme muette qui peut écouter...\. C'est si nostalgique.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Huh?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Hein ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Say, do you remember your name?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Dis, est-ce que tu te souviens de ton nom ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: So...\. what should we call you, then?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Donc...\. Comment il faudrait t'appeler ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: How about... \c[3]Lea\c[0]?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Que dirais-tu de... \c[3]Lea\c[0] ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Here are images of different landscapes.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Voici des images de paysages différents.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Do you remember what forests look like?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Est-ce que tu te souviens à quoi ressemble une forêt ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [nods]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Well then... can you point at the image showing forests?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bien... Est-ce que tu peux me montrer une image avec une forêt ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: That's correct.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est exact.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: So you remember basic concepts pretty well already.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Donc tu te souviens déjà bien des concepts basiques.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: So, what about yesterday's sign, can you still do it?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Sinon, le signe qu'on a appris hier, tu peux encore le faire ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: You forgot already...?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu as déjà oublié... ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Oh, dear...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Oh, déjà...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Is there any sign you remember?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Il y a un autre signe dont tu te souviens ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Well, that's something.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bon, c'est déjà quelque chose.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: It's pretty clear now that it's not just your speech that's missing.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais il est clair que ce n'est pas seulement ta parole qui manque.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Writing things down doesn't work...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Écrire les choses ne fonctionne pas...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: And we only get so far with hand signs...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Et on ne va pas très loin avec le langage des signes...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: It's like you're missing the ability to recall  "words"... or any abstract concept.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est comme s'il te manquait la capacité de te souvenir des "mots"... où de n'importe quel concept abstrait.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Lea, it's ok.\. Please don't feel bad about this.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Lea, c'est bon.\. Ne te sens pas mal à cause de ça.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Hello, Lea...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bonjour, Lea...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Always the same...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Toujours la même chose...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Isn't it funny how it always goes the same way?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: N'est-ce pas curieux de voir comment les choses se répètent toujours de la même manière ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: All the support I gave them...\. all the things I did...\. it suddenly doesn't matter.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Tout le soutien que je leur ai donné...\. Tout ce que j'ai pu faire pour eux...\. Soudainement, ça n'a plus d'importance.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Just because of conflicting ideals.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Juste parce qu'on a des idéaux différents.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: And all at once, things have to go hostile.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Et d'un coup, les choses s'enveniment.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Sorry...\. this really shouldn't concern you.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Désolé...\. Il n'y a vraiment pas d'inquiétude à te faire.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: So, any more hand signs you remember?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Donc, est-ce que tu te souviens d'un signe de la main ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Alright, so you can still count.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Ah, bien, tu sais encore comment compter.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: That is something you picked up rather quickly.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est quelque chose que tu as comprise assez rapidement.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Oh... back to trying this again?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Oh... Tu essayes encore de faire ça ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Haha, don't worry.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Haha, ne t'inquiète pas.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: You won't need that for any of the signs.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu n'as pas besoin de faire ça pour les signes.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: What is it?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Do you want me to tell you more about her?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Tu veux que je t'en dise plus sur elle ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [nods]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Well...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Bon...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: We met through work several years ago.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: On s'est rencontré au travail il y a plusieurs années déjà.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: She was competent...\. hardworking.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Elle était compétente...\. travailleuse.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: \c[3]Mute\c[0]... but that didn't stop her from doing her job.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: \c[3]Muette\c[0]... mais ça ne l'empêchait pas de faire son travail.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: We communicated via writing at first.\. Then I learned sign language.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Au départ on communiquait à l'écrit.\. Puis j'ai appris le langage des signes.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: But even then...\. she never was much of a talker.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais même comme ça...\. Elle était pas de nature très causante.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Just...\. very, very good at listening.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais...\. elle écoutait vraiment très bien.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: My job was all about having good relationships.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Dans mon travail, il fallait juste que j'aie de bonnes relations.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: I've met so many people, always busy keeping up connections.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: J'ai rencontré tellement de gens, j'étais toujours occupé à garder contact avec eux.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Yet...\. it was all so very shallow.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais...\. C'était toujours aussi...\. superficiel.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: With her... it was different.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Avec elle... c'était différent.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: She was one of the few people I could speak openly to.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Elle était l'une des seules personnes avec qui je pouvais parler ouvertement.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: It's similar with you.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est pareil avec toi.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: I suppose, I just get along well with mute people?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: J'imagine que je me plais bien avec les gens muets ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: So what? We're just humans.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais bon...\. Nous ne sommes que des humains.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: The world's most self-absorbed creature.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: La créature la plus égocentrique du monde.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: We really like to think highly of ourselves.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Nous aimons toujours nous penser supérieurs.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: And sure...\. we certainly came and went far.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Oui, bien sûr...\. En tant qu'espèce on est allé très loin.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: But in the end...\. we are just another kind of creature lost in this vast universe.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Mais au final...\. on est juste qu'une créature perdue...\. perdue dans l'immensité de l'univers.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Lea...\. do you remember what a clear sky looks like at night?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Lea...\. tu te souviens à quoi ressemble un ciel dégagé dans la nuit ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: Out in the countryside, no town or city nearby?
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Loin, dans la campagne, loin de toutes les villes ?

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: I hope one day you will...
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: J'espère qu'un jour tu pourras le voir...

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: It is like...\. a boundless sea of stars.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: C'est comme...\. Un océan sans fin d'étoiles.

maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.orig: When you see it, you start to realize...\. just how insignificant we are to this world.
maps/dreams/dream16.json/entities/28/set.text: Quand on le voit, on finit par comprendre...\. à quel point on est tous insignifiant aux yeux de ce monde.
